title: Snapdeal cofounder Kunal Bahl joins panel of investors on Shark Tank India, Season 4
description: Others on the panel include Oyo founder Ritesh Agarwal, executive director of Emcure Pharmaceuticals Namita Thapar, boAT cofounder Aman Gupta, and People Group’s Anupam Mittal.
content: Snapdeal cofounder Kunal Bahl has officially joined the panel of investors on the popular business reality show Shark Tank India, Season 4.The showmakers shared the news on the microblogging platform X, "From co-founding @snapdeal to backing some of India's most promising startups with @TitanCapitalVC, Kunal’s entrepreneurial journey has been extraordinary. Now, he's ready to bring his passion for building and scaling businesses to the @sharktankindia stage!"
